QuestData.Title: Rubble Rummaging
QuestData.Description:
I do not know how long it's been since my captors left me here, but the Light has... taken its toll.
You must help me escape. The key to my shackles should be hidden nearby. Perhaps among the rubble? That's likely where I'd hide something small.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Shackle Key among the rubble within Ashen Traverse.
QuestData.RewardText: This looks like it could fit.
